tutorial: How to Set up a New Chart

definition.text: I know I'm ready to add some charts. Are you? Let's add the foundational nodes we need to start our chart.

paragraphs.text: Enough chit-chat, letâ€™s start adding some charts!
Hover over the Testing Environment Dashboard and click Add Time Machine.
Make sure to name it something you will recognize. A good naming practice is to reference the Trading System and type of Trading Session that will be connected to the chart.  For us that would be:
